tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.2.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Ares
programme.desc: Someone kills a Naval officer on Okinawa, then his ship encounters major trouble during war games at sea.

programme.title: JAG: Skeleton Crew
programme.desc: The body of a woman Naval officer, a friend, and classmate of Harm, is found ashore.

programme.title: JAG: Trinity
programme.desc: Harm and his new partner, Marine Major Sara MacKenzie are drawn into a game of revenge when they're sent to Belfast, Ireland, to represent the legal interests of a Navy Lieutenant whose infant son has seemingly been abducted.

programme.title: JAG: Secrets
programme.desc: Admiral Chegwidden, Mac and Bud Roberts are taken hostage in the Admiral's office by Pvt. Magida, a Marine who escaped from a nearby Federal prison.

programme.title: JAG: Ghosts
programme.desc: Harm and Mac investigate an attempt on Admiral Chedwiggen's life and uncover the fact that all the members of his former SEAL team have died under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: JAG: Full Engagement
programme.desc: While on their day off, Harm takes Mac for a flight in his vintage airplane, only to be forced to make an emergency landing in a mountain clearing because of mechanical problems.

programme.title: JAG: Cowboys and Cossaks
programme.desc: Harm, Mac, and Bud are assigned sea duty to monitor a joint war games exercise between U.S. and Russian naval forces.

programme.title: JAG: The Guardian
programme.desc: Harm and Mac defend Bauwer, a former Navy Seal, now a homeless man, who's accused of using excessive force when he killed three men who tried to hold up a convenience store.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Rendevous
programme.desc: Mac and Harm once again find themselves courtroom adversaries as Mac is assigned the difficult task of defending CPO Holst, an admitted wife abuser accused of murdering his wife's boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.sub-title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Vote
programme.desc: On Election Day, as democracy hangs in the balance, Team Scorpion is called on when someone tries to throw the U.S. presidential election into chaos.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sly And The Family Stone
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion travels to Ireland for Megan's one-year memorial, Walter discovers that a nearby lake's natural disaster has created a poisonous cloud that could kill everyone in the village.

programme.title: Scorpion: Mother Load
programme.desc: Paige's estranged mother calls on Team Scorpion when she accidentally uncovers a forgotten nuclear reactor on the verge of exploding.

programme.title: Scorpion: This Is The Pits
programme.desc: Walter must swim through the deadly La Brea Tar Pits when Team Scorpion helps a woman trapped in the tar before she runs out of oxygen.

programme.title: Scorpion: Wreck The Halls
programme.desc: It's Christmas Eve and Team Scorpion's electronics-free mountain getaway turns deadly when they come across gun-runners, and Ralph is kidnapped when they try to escape.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ice Ca-Cabes
programme.desc: When a mission in the desert results in exploding shrapnel that seriously wounds Cabe, Team Scorpion must freeze his body in order to save his life.

programme.title: Scorpion: Faux Money Maux Problems
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion is duped into producing counterfeit money for a foreign entity intent on ruining the U.S. economy, Paige must rely on her mother Veronica's skills as a grifter to save them.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Hole Truth
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must save a man teetering on the edge of a massive sink hole that threatens to destroy the Los Angeles water supply forever.

programme.title: Scorpion: Sharknerdo
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's job to find sunken treasure goes awry when Walter and Paige's boat explodes, leaving them lost in the middle of the Pacific Ocean surrounded by sharks.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The One That Got Away
programme.desc: When a woman gets brutally attacked in the same manner as deceased rookie cop Zoe Martinelli. Det. Luke Callaghan is convinced that it’s the same suspect.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Monster
programme.desc: After a seemingly drunken man collapses in the barn, 15 Division is put under quarantine. Andy and Swarek work together to find the accomplice of a dyed blue bank robber.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Dov and Gail work together under Swarek’s expert tutelage in a stake-out operation to stop an Asian gang from killing a snitch.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: 15 Division’s hunt for an armed robber leads them to the scene of a horrible car accident. While Andy deals with a woman pinned in her car, the other officers must track and apprehend the fugitive.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Little Faith
programme.desc: When Traci and Andy are sent out on an undercover training exercise, they stumble upon a young woman who is about to die of an overdose. Meanwhile, Dov finds himself on a “ride-along” with a drug dealer and old friend of his deceased brother.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: On The Double
programme.desc: When Gail Peck’s uniform is stolen, the rookies go after a vigilante who is impersonating a police officer. Meanwhile, Swarek’s off the grid, trying to get information out of former crime enforcer Jamie Brennan.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: God’s Good Grace
programme.desc: While Swarek is brutally interrogated by Jamie Brennan in the basement of a Pickering farmhouse, the rookies help Andy solve a mystery that may reveal Swarek’s location.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fresh Paint
programme.desc: Andy McNally’s first shift on the job turns into mayhem when shots are fired in a downtown rooming house. In the midst of the chaos, Andy triumphantly makes her first big arrest.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Mercury Retrograde
programme.desc: As the other rookies hunt down a dangerous escaped convict, Swarek drags Andy through his undercover hauntson a mission he won’t explain. At first, Andy assumes Swarek is a rogue cop trying to settle scores from his undercover days.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Fite Nite
programme.desc: While working on a high-stakes gun raid, Andy and Gail stumble upon a victim of domestic abuse whose brutal experience in the system has taught her not to trust the police.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Middleton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette and her team are called to a grade II listed building that spans over 900 years in an attempt to uncover the mysterious paranormal activity that is said to occur there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall
programme.desc: Karl ventures alone into the underneath Leeds Town Hall into the dark prison cells that is said to be haunted by a plethora of unhappy spirits, one doesn’t seem happy that Karl is there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: GLOUCESTER PRISON Pt1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding leads her team in a two-part investigation at the foreboding Gloucester Prison, one of Britain's most haunted places, known for its history of death, fear, pain, suicide, and incarceration.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The last part sees the team reach their limits as the spirits of this enormous location continue to emerge from the shadows. But will the enormity of the paranormal activity prove too much for the world-famous team.

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: A haunted house, a haunted school and a haunted auction hall, all in one location, Bishton Hall. With stories of poltergeist activity, ghostly figures, strange voices and a dark entity, what will the Most Haunted team uncover tonight.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Prison
programme.desc: A small prison in Yorkshire gives a big impact when Yvette and her team attempt to stay the night. Although many inmates were released some are still locked up and they are not happy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn’t the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Standon Hall Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on a three-part investigation that tests them to the very core. A place that surprised intrigued and terrified the hardened team, making Standon Hall the most fearful place they have investigated.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Dead Presidents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to King George, Virginia to become the first paranormal team to investigate Belle Grove Plantation.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Phantoms of the Opera
programme.desc: On this special Halloween episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio to investigate the Cincinnati Music Hall, a buildingwhere the hauntingsare as frequent as the performances.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 8
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Serial Killer's Revenge
programme.desc: Jason and the TAPS team head to Charleston, South Carolina, one of the most haunted cities in America and winner of Ghost Hunters America's Hometown Ghost Hunt Contest.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.sub-title: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Answers Given to Questions Never Asked
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.

programme.title: Andromeda: Waking the Tyrant's Device
programme.desc: The crew must stop a world shipbuilder before he launches another invasion.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double or Nothingness
programme.desc: Dylan is kidnapped by Nietscheans and forced to play mind games for the amusement of his captors.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Two Nietzschean siblings are in a stand-off over a weapon that can eliminate higher brain functions.

programme.title: Andromeda: Soon the Nearing Vortex
programme.desc: Tyr returns, having joined with the Collectors and demands the route of ages from his former crewmates.

programme.title: Andromeda: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.sub-title: The World Turns All Around Her
programme.desc: A hostage situation ensues when the crew confronts Tyr.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Conduit to Destiny
programme.desc: A wrong turn in the slipstream leads Andromeda to a prison riot.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.215
programme.desc:
A teenager sues her ex-boyfriend for the return of cell phone and			
for punitive damages from an assault.			
A man is suing his former friend for lighting his couch on fire; he			
countersues for storage fees.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.10
programme.desc: Dog breeder accused of misrepresenting breed; teacup Chihuahua weighs over 12 pounds/Underage drinking during basketball damages car, sparks liability dispute.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.247
programme.desc:
Alleged abuse of a seven-year-old boy, unpaid loans, and shared			
living expenses are disputed by ex-lovers.			
A loan to buy work clothes, a broken lease, and unpaid child			
support come into play when former lovers fight over money.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.224
programme.desc: A teenager denies falsely accusing a woman of assault; she claims the woman and her friends attacked her first.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.135
programme.desc: Shady car salesman sacked for BMW lease scam; dealership owner denies fault. Two women brawl over car keying amid infidelity claims against shared ex.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.251
programme.desc: Allegations arise in a lawsuit where a woman sues her ex for a loan to break his apartment lease. A CD collection is withheld amid a dispute between former partners. A man goes into rehab for addiction, leading to his ex-roommate suing after he moved out.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.152
programme.desc: Stolen identity and falsification of billing records are the charges a man lays against his sister’s former landlord.\t\t\t\r\nUnrequited love, a loan to buy school books, and unpaid rent divide former friends.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.87
programme.desc: Man sues ex-wife and her girlfriend for allegedly stealing property; she claims he threatened her life. High school coach sues teenager for totaling motor scooter; teen argues it was his first solo scooter ride.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.28
programme.desc: Denying they sold their friends a lemon, a man and his fiancée sue for slander and harassment/A black Labrador bites an 8-year-old in the face; the child’s mother sues a friend for the cost of plastic surgery to repair the wound.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.121
programme.desc: 12-year-old allegedly vandalizes security system/Man sues ex for damaging home and clothes during break-in attempt. She admits to the damage, claims they're even now.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.249
programme.desc: A woman sues her son for eviction fees and stopping payment on an apartment. A teen's father breaks his son's phone used for alleged drug purchases, leaving the other teen's father with the bill.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.183
programme.desc: A questionable signature on a lease agreement backs a teenager's claim of being scammed on rent. A cheerleading coach faces a lawsuit for allegedly running a school in sub-par facilities without proper credentials.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.96
programme.desc: A woman is suing her husband’s ex-wife and teenage daughter for damaging her car when the teenager allegedly pounded it with her fist/A teenager is accused of horsing around and crashing a relative’s Oldsmobile Allero into a curb.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.86
programme.desc: Botched deal to trade babysitting for rent leaves ex-roommates fighting over dumped clothes and unpaid bills. Woman accuses friend of kidnapping her kids during her jail time, refuses to repay dental loan.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.55
programme.desc: Teen throws house party while dad's away; alleged damages to neighbor's car ensue. Young ex-lovers dispute alleged loan for body-piercing school. Woman sues body-piercing student ex-roommate for unpaid rent.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.40
programme.desc: Electrician denies vandalizing home, stealing materials post-firing. Expert witness called for damages/Woman sues ex for furniture return; he claims she gave it when moving out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.196
programme.desc: Louis Vuitton bag allegedly stolen during nightclub visit by father-son duo. Dog-grooming aspirant clashes with landlord over rented room in her house.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.220
programme.desc: A teenager alleges her college scholarship was at risk due to her roommate's drug use. Another teen, attempting to jump over a vintage Mustang, lands on the car and is sued for damages by the owner.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants compete in a surf and turf protein relay for the chance to win a day of surfing in San Diego.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: A shock elimination forces both teams to regroup. Guitarist Joe Perry and singer Estelle are among the dinner guests.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants take part in an ingredient crossword challenge. Kid-friendly items must be incorporated into dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants are tasked with cooking their own version of a southern staple, to be judged by chef Chris Hastings.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams prepare special menu items for the International Ballroom Invitational; the winners go kayaking in the Pacific Ocean and have lunch at the Lark; the losers prepare a raw bar for the ballroom event.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants are challenged to taste pureed baby food, with the winning team enjoying massages and a nice lunch.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The newly reformed teams try to impress their celebrity diners, but another tough dinner service leads to a shocking elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs pair up for a taste challenge, followed by a dinner service celebrating major contributors to "Stand Up to Cancer".(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs team up for a challenge to combine the flavours of two countries. Chef Roy Yamaguchi is a guest judge.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeye’s Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Operation Repo: Flame-Thrown for a Loop
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Probation Abomination
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Russian Roulette
programme.desc: Matt and Sonia take on an award-winning fencing coach, but all bets are off when his students go on the offensive with real swords.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Little Froy's Big Mistake
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo: M.I.A. & D.E.A
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Suspicious Packages
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Class Clown
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around LA for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Revenge Gone Wrong
programme.desc: When Matt almost gets run down by a posse of graffiti-packing gangsters, he sets into motion a plan of revenge against Lyndah.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smut Campaign
programme.desc: After Ronnie suffers a near-fatal wound during an attack on the lot, he reconsiders his role in the repo business.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Warzone at the Worksite
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Vengeful Streak
programme.desc: Matt and Ronnie repo a Porsche from a maniac; Carlos and Ronnie come face to face during their repo of a cable van.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Free Free Time
programme.desc: When Audrey's weekly girls' night out is canceled, Jeff seeks out time alone; however, his plans are foiled every step of the way. Meanwhile, Russell discovers that Timmy has a lot of pent-up aggression toward him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Score
programme.desc: Jeff spends the evening trying to avoid learning the score of a Rangers game after Audrey forces him to give up his tickets and go to her boss' party instead. Meanwhile, at the game, Russell is mortified when Timmy roots against the home team.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Atlantic City
programme.desc: Audrey tries to make Jeff feel guilty for not telling her that his friend's bachelor party in Atlantic City was canceled; however, her plan backfires when Jeff discovers that Audrey is also being deceitful.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Harassment
programme.desc: A new employee with an axe to grind against Audrey files a sexual harassment claim against her. Meanwhile, after being teased for playing cricket, Timmy challenges Jeff to a game to prove the sport is not for wimps.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Surrogate
programme.desc: An overly enthusiastic Audrey pushes it too far with a surrogate mother who she and Jeff are considering paying to have their baby. Meanwhile, Russell shamelessly pokes fun at Jennifer and Adam's wedding Web site.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: They Do?
programme.desc: Adam and Jennifer plan a secret wedding; however, a series of unfortunate events puts their plan in jeopardy. Meanwhile, to keep Russell and Timmy from finding out about the ceremony, Adam tells them he is staging an intervention for Jeff.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Rug-of-War
programme.desc: Upset that he'll have to purchase a new rug after Audrey gives their old one to Adam and Jenn, Jeff tries to sabotage the gift by telling Adam about all the 'fun' that he and Audrey had on it.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Bank
programme.desc: When Jeff screws up paying for Audrey's Pilates classes, he reveals to Adam that he has a 'Bank' of mistakes that she has incurred that he uses to ease her anger. Russell sends an email to Timmy's crush.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Surro-Gate
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey discover surprising news about their surrogate.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Handy Man
programme.desc: When Audrey realizes Jeff is getting a bit bored in the bedroom, she tries to spice it up. Russell gets called out on a business trip, but has a fear of flying. He invites Timmy to distract him.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Play Ball
programme.desc: Audrey considers quitting her job when she realizes it's making her life miserable. Although things are heated between Allison and Timmy, she wants to put their sex life aside so they can spend time getting to know each other.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Baked
programme.desc: Audrey embarks on a new start after quitting her demanding job; however, her time at home makes her stir crazy, prompting her to start a cookie business. Timmy is getting advice from the guys who encourage him to be more of a dude than a gentleman.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Les-Bro
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey embark on finding a surrogate mother, only to run into problems with the interviewing process. Russell's wealthy mother comes to town, and he reluctantly decides to have her stop paying his rent.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Mannequin Head Ball
programme.desc: Stuck with a store Jeff leased for Audrey's fleeting cookie shop, he and Adam stay behind to clean up and discover a new game using the heads of mannequins.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Hunt for Santa
programme.desc: Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again. So now the Dog, with a posse expanded to include his children and grandchildren, sets off on a hunt through the Colorado Rockies for Santa Claus himself!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Dog believes in safety first, and today's hunt puts this philosophy to the test. The fugitive's problem with anger management increases the dangers of their already risky line of work. Dog warns the crew to be ready for anything as they head out.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait and Switch
programme.desc: Things are seldom what they seem in the world of bounty hunting. When the fugitive's girlfriend offers to help Dog trap this dangerous felon, Dog knows that someone is being deceived. The only question is, whom?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: True Identity
programme.desc: Dog knows that looks can be deceiving. The fugitive is pretty, petite, and trouble. She stands accused of settling an argument with the help of a box cutter. What Dog does not anticipate is how deceptive this femme fatale can truly be!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Match Point
programme.desc: Duty calls and the Chapmans are off on a hunt. The team chases a fugitive who has disappeared into a world of "no known addresses.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mister Mom
programme.desc: It's been quite a while since Tim Chapman put down his mace can and bulletproof vest to care for his growing family. When his old friend Dog calls asking for help tracking an elusive felon, Tim jumps into action.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Scared Straight
programme.desc: Dog tracks a fugitive who is on the run from the law for the first time. Reading the file Dog knows the young man's life is at the crossroads. Will he be able to track down this wanna-be-gangsta in time to convince him to make the right choice?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.sub-title: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.(n)

programme.title: The Four Warriors
programme.desc: Travelling home, four soldiers discover a village gripped by fear, as residents are abducted by unknown predators. These warriors set out to rescue them and destroy what lurks outside the village.

programme.title: Battle Beyond The Stars
programme.desc: A young farmer sets out to recruit mercenaries to defend his peaceful planet, which is under threat of invasion by the evil tyrant Sador and his armada of aggressors. Starring: George Peppard, Robert Vaughn, Richard Thomas.

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: An ex-con and his adopted younger brother are forced to go on the run. Chased by a criminal, the feds, and a cadre of soldiers, their only protection is a found weapon of mysterious ancestry.

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: The Simple Life of Noah Dearborn
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Sidney Poitier and Dianne Wiest star with Mary-Louise Parker in this enchanting tale about a quiet hero who becomes the talk of the town.

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a call-girl-turned-actress and works to help her advance her career, but things get a little more complicated than they bargained for.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Dwayne Johnson stars as an NYPD detective trying to solve the biggest cash heist in U.S. history.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: WARRIOR tells the moving and inspirational story of the Conlon family, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) and Paddy (Nick Nolte), who find redemption in the ring as they fight to repair themselves and their family.

programme.title: The Disappearance Of Eleanor Rigby
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain and James McAvoy dazzle in this drama hailed as "one of the most romantic love stories ever." A married couple torn apart by tragedy tries to reclaim the life they once shared.(n)

programme.title: The Big Fight
programme.desc: Tien Peng and Cheung Ching-ching play the leaders of a rebel group of Chinese kung fu fighters in a Japanese occupied town at the height of the war.

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: A brilliant thief has masterminded a series of high-stake bank heists, and for two detectives, the only hope for survival is finding an order to the chaos.

programme.title: Hunt to Kill: Hunt to Kill (2010)
programme.desc: When Jim's (Steve Austin of TV's WWE) teenage daughter is kidnapped, he's forced to lead a band of ruthless killers into the wilderness to retrieve their share of a missing heist score.

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A fallen warrior rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master. Starring: Clive Owen, Morgan Freeman, Aksel Hennie.(n)

programme.title: Shoelaces For Christmas
programme.desc: When Jennifer’s father forces her to volunteer at the shelter to teach her compassion and responsibility, she creates an unlikely bond with the staff and a special young guest which makes her realize the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Starring Matthew Knight and Chris Kattan. Three children and their father move from California to Canada. When they go shopping at the mall, they find counterfeit cash, inadvertently help catch crooks, and make a discovery about Santa.

programme.title: It's Christmas Carol!
programme.desc: Inspired by the Charles Dickens classic A Christmas Carol, It’s Christmas Carol! tells the story of a driven,\n heartless, publishing executive, Carol Huffman, who on Christmas Eve is visited by the ghost of her\n former boss, Eve.

programme.title: Wish Upon A Christmas
programme.desc: When business executive Amelia returns home to help a family-run ornament company, the employees see her as their savior who is coming in to rescue the company.

programme.title: Under the Mistletoe
programme.desc: Starring Jaime Ray Newman, Michael Shanks, and Conan Graham. At Christmas, the tables turn on a selfless single mom when a local radio station takes over her love life after an innocent call from her 8-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Inspired To Kill
programme.desc: When an aspiring mystery writer finds a perfect mentor, she finds herself in an all too real story of murder.

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: One time top public defender returns to LA to try to stop her sister from going to jail for first degree murder, but Samantha also comes face to face with the past she ran away from.

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: Haven't We Met Before
programme.desc: After attempting to murder a woman he's convinced tried to kill him in a past life, a man is committed to a hospital for the criminally insane, but a suspicious District Attorney is convinced that the man has killed before.

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.

programme.title: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor
programme.desc: An ambitious intern (Jurnee Smollett-Bell) at matchmaking firm for millionaires has an extramarital affair with a charismatic client (Robbie Jones) whose boldness and charm mask a dark side.

programme.title: The Glass Castle
programme.desc: Based on a memoir, four children struggle to grow up in a rambling, poverty-stricken, wildly unconventional environment overseen by their dysfunctional yet uniquely loving parents.

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: Detective Cristofuoro (Russell Crowe) investigates the murder of a family, and has to figure out if a violent teen is responsible.

programme.title: Traffik
programme.desc: A couple and their two friends embark on a weekend getaway to an isolated estate in the mountains. They soon find themselves in a fight for their lives when members of a violent biker gang show up to protect their secrets from the outside world.

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: A husband (Nicolas Cage) and wife's (Nicole Kidman) own deceptions and betrayals come to light when thieves invade their home and hold them hostage.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: While Earp is out of town bringing in Blackie Saunders against Kelley's orders, Curly and Ringgold take over Dodge City.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Bounty Killer
programme.desc: Col. Benteen asks Earp to help with a string of murders in the outlaw area called Robber's Roost. Earp agrees to investigate and finds himself working with outlaws.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Caught by a Whisker
programme.desc: Two brothers decide to rob the Dodge City State National Bank. However, a new alarm bell in the bank and a wise Earp expecting them pose problems for the men getting away.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Mysterious Cowhand
programme.desc: After Earp's cousin is killed with a knife, Earp decides to go alone to Texas disguised as a cowhand to find the killer.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: General Sherman asks Earp to intervene with the Nez Perce tribe and Chief Joseph about reclaiming a Gatling gun stolen by Nez Perce.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.

programme.title: Joshua
programme.desc: A black soldier returns from fighting in the Civil War only to find out that his mother, maid to a frontier family has been murdered by a gang of bandits. He becomes a bounty hunter, determined to track down and kill the men who killed his mother.

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: In a lawless and violent time, six young outcasts are hired by an English merchant as 'regulators' to guard his ranch against the mob, a corrupt and powerful ring.(n)

programme.title: A Kid in King Arthur's Court
programme.desc: When a violent earthquake rocks Southern California, hapless teenager Calvin Fuller (Thomas Ian Nicholas) finds himself careening through a hole torn in the fabric of time.

programme.title: Class Rank
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Holt (Cloak & Dagger), Skyler Gisondon (Booksmart) and Bruce Dern (The Senator). Two high school outsiders join forces to overtake the local school board.

programme.title: Smi
programme.desc: A mischievous thirteen-year-old crosses paths with a lovable mutt named Smitty, and with help from the unlikely canine companion, learns the importance of friendship, family and responsibility.

programme.title: A Doggone Adventure
programme.desc: Just Jesse the Jack Russell and a group of junior detectives find things get very mysterious when they find themselves entangled in a world of UFOs and secret agents. A Doggone Adventure is a rip roaring, fast paced adventure for all the family.

programme.title: The Mighty Macs
programme.desc: In the early 70s, Cathy Rush becomes the head basketball coach at a tiny, all-girls Catholic college. Though her team has no gym and no uniforms Coach Rush looks to steer her girls to their first national championship.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella Pact
programme.desc: Nola, Deb, and Nancy are best friends who create a Cinderella Pact—a weight loss agreement using advice from "fairy godmother" newspaper columnist Bel.

programme.title: Bottle Shock
programme.desc: The story of the early days of California wine making featuring the now infamous, blind Paris wine tasting of 1976 that has come to be known as "Judgment of Paris". Feat: Chris Pine, Alan Rickman & Bill Pullman.

programme.title: The Hippopotamus
programme.desc: Charming comedy based on the best-selling novel by Stephen Fry. A disgraced poet investigates a series of unexplained miracles.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Deep inside the most secure bank in America, three desperate women from very different worlds cook up the most unlikely heist of the century: Smuggle out millions of dollars in worn-out currency headed for a Federal Reserve shredder every day.

programme.title: The Decoy Bride
programme.desc: A heart-warming romantic comedy about an ordinary girl who is hired to be the decoy for the most famous bride in the world.(n)

programme.title: Floods of Fear
programme.desc: Two inmates who have been put to work during a severe flood are washed away in the strong current, along with their guard. The trio find refuge in an isolated house partly engulfed with water but also containing a frightened woman.

programme.title: The Frightened City
programme.desc: A small time thief is recruited by a mobster to help with the racketeering. He doesn't like the job, but with the mob on his back, a femme fatale in his bed and a sick friend to care for, he will have to keep all his wits about him.

programme.title: Brighton Rock
programme.desc: An amoral young petty criminal called Pinkie operates on Brighton racecourse and becomes involved with an innocent young waitress in a bid to stop her talking about a journalist he's murdered.

programme.title: The Happiest Days of Your Life
programme.desc: A girls' school is evacuated to the country, but due to a bureaucratic error they find themselves billeted with a boys' school. While the boys and girls soon hit it off, the headmaster clashes with the headmistress and chaos ensues.

programme.title: Holiday Camp
programme.desc: The Huggett family go to a holiday camp, and get involved in crooked card players, a murderer on the run, and a pregnant young girl and her boyfriend who is also missing from home.

programme.title: Heavens Above!
programme.desc: An innocent but socially progressive vicar is appointed by mistake to a wealthy, moribund parish. His forward-thinking ideas about Christianity soon begin to upset the conservative parishioners.(n)

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E10 - Coup By Clam
programme.sub-title: Farscape: S4 E10 - Coup By Clam
programme.desc: The crew consume food, sharing amongst themselves. Although if not ingested by the same person, it becomes toxic.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E11 - Unrealized Reality
programme.desc: Crichton falls into a wormhole and meets up with a strange man who shows Crichton the consequences of wormhole travel.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S4 E12 - Kansas
programme.desc: After accidentally returning to Earth, Crichton discovers he is in 1985 and he has altered the timeline.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Leland confesses to killing Jacques Renault. Andy wants to take a new sperm count test. Rumor spreads that a food critic is coming to Twin Peaks. Jean asks Ben to set a trap for Cooper in exchange for Audrey's life.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper discovers he had forgotten about the message under his bed. Shelly and Bobby begin Leo's home care. Sternwood hears pretrial motions and declares Leo not fit for trial. Nadine comes home, still thinking she's in high school.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: James saves the girls from a tormented Harold. Cooper brings Audrey home. Bobby and Shelly learn that their insurance plans have backfired. Donna tries to convince Truman that Harold Smith has Laura's secret diary.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Ye Gods
programme.desc: Cupid arrives in the modern world. A love spell for his target does not work as well as he hopes.

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: If She Dies
programme.desc: A year after his wife died a man is involved in a car accident that leaves his young daughter in a coma. On his way home the man has a vision.(n)

programme.title: New Twilight Zone: Examination Day/A Message From Charity
programme.desc: In the far future, twelve-year-old Dickie must take the government intelligence test/A 16-year old in 1985 finds himself in telepathic contact with a girl in 1700. Her knowledge of the future gets her accused of being a witch.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Essence
programme.desc: Renee's brother has PTSD. In a desperate effort to help him, she agrees to let him undergo special treatment. The treatment removes his emotion. The project is overseen by Sandoval and the emotion they take is given to Da'an.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Phantom Companion
programme.desc: While on board the mothership, Renee sustains an injury and while being treated, she gets pulled into the walls and disappears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dream Stalker
programme.desc: Street asks Liam to help a friend who's arrested for the murder of a man he hated. Liam talks to him and he claims that he dreamed of killing him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Lost Generation
programme.desc: A CVI malfunctions and kills a soon-to-be father. The investigation leads Liam and Renee to a fertility clinic. Renee finds out she is infertile and suspects that Taelon technology is affecting worldwide fertility.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Normandy
programme.desc: In a look back to 1944 and World War II, Magnus has learned of a new weather controlling device developed by the Nazis and intended to be deployed against the approaching allied armada.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Carentan
programme.desc: The Sanctuary receives reports that several people have gone missing, all around the town of Carentan in the Normandy region of France.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Out Of The Blue
programme.desc: Meet Helen and Will: neighbors on a tree-lined, suburban street. Helen lives alone, dislikes her neighbor’s dog and is a talented painter.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Into The Black
programme.desc: The Sanctuary receives alarming news that a large group of Abnormals has been spotted at the entrance to a cave in South Dakota.

programme.title: Sanctuary: Tempus
programme.desc: Adam Worth destroys Praxis and travels back in time to the 1890s to save his daughter. Dr. Magnus travels back in time to stop him before he damages the time line and destroys her future with it.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Uprising
programme.desc: With Magnus gone, Will is appointed the head of the Sanctuary Network. The abnormal uprising continues to get worse. Biggie and Kate are kidnapped. As expected the surface governments respond to the uprising with deadly force.(n)
